name: SNS Video Game Audio File
summary: Learn about .SNS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SNS files are rare. You will likely only encounter them if you are attempting to modify the gameplay of a game that uses the file type to store its sound effects and music. For example, a gamer playing Burnout Paradise may navigate the game's resource files (stored in the game installation directory) and modify SNS files to alter the sounds and music played in the game. Additionally, examples of codecs used to encode data in an SNS file include EALayer3 or EA XAS ADPCM.

instructions: You can only open SNS files with programs that support the codec used to encode the audio data in the SNS files. For example, the ealayer3.exe program can decode SNS files that use EALayer3 to encode audio data. Also, FFmpeg can decode EA XAS ADPCM formatted SNS files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
